record.Statements: HTML is what type of language ?

record.Options: User defined tags,Pre-specified tags,Fixed tags defined by the language,Tags only for linking

record.Statements: The year in which HTML was first proposed _______.

Apart from <b> tag, what other tag makes text bold ?
What is the full form of HTML?
record.Options: A. HyperText Markup Language B. Hyper Teach Markup Language C. Hyper Tech Markup Language D. None of these

record.Statements: Who is Known as the father of World Wide Web (WWW)?
record.Options: A. Robert Cailliau B. Tim Thompson C. Charles Darwin D. Tim Berners-Lee

record.Statements: What should be the first tag in any HTML document?
How can you make a bulleted list with numbers?

record.Options: A. picture B. image C. img D. src
